page.title: 16Home Life
page.content: Domestic Appliances Electrical:vacuum cleaner,washing machine,telephone,cooker,tumble drier,dishwasher,toaster,hot water boiler,food processor,microwave oven,kettle,sandwich maker, refridgerator,freezer,liquidiser, electric knife, iron, knife sharpener, sewing machine, coffee maker, electric blanket,spin drier, fire, radiators, fan,lamps,battery charger. Gas: fire,light,cooker. Entertainment: Record player,video, television, computer, radio,tape recorder, organ,slide/cine projector. Personal Hygiene: Hair crinkler, shaver,curling tongs, hair drier, electric toothbrush. Garden (electrical): lawnmower, strimmer,chain saw,hedge cutter, cultivator.
